body:
Hey! Ask me something! If you don't......
neh.

Evilchrizillah:
Q:Will we actually seriously make a map?
A:Of course!
Q:And do you want to build a snowman?
A:Sure, only if I can pee on it.

Tincanrobotman:
Q:Am I really a noob?
A:Yes, a swaggy and friendly noob. :)
Q:What do you love the most about Avicus?
A:Nebula TDMs and the awesome community!

Avumbaca:
Q:What music do you listen to?
A:Mostly EDM
Q:Would you rather be a bull or a Lion and why?
A:I'd rather to be a lion then a bull. Bulls are cool but have you ever seen a bullfight? After the fight they just get killed. In the wild they get killed to by predators. Lions don't get killed by animals really fast. They are bootiful as well!
The lion is really fast too, I always wanted to be fast. I'm really slow. xD
Thecalined:
Q:Why are you no more derpy :/
A:I'm still a derp, and I always be a derp. There is a derp face on my heart. As you can see. I don't have a derp skin anymore. but that's a lie. There is still a derp face on my head. I just painted it! :-)

jozzmcozz:
Q:How did you come up with "Craft_Sem"?
A:Well I actually wanted the name Craft_Semen. But it was inappropriate.
Neh, I'm not very creative so yeah.... Sooooo how did you come up with your name? Well.... Sem is my real name. And Craft is the last part of the game named "Minecraft" No poop sherlock. xD Back then I was really happy about it.
I thought it was the best name ever. But it's not. xD

Evilchrizillah:
Q:What would you look like as a kitten, besides derpy because we all know you're really good at that :3
A:Haha, probaly a derp ummmm nvm. I want to be a black with white cat.
I find them awesome!

Tincanrobotman:
Q:Do you want to build a snow man?
A:No, There is a difference between a snowman and a snow man.
I can't pee on a snow man. Even though I really want to. A snow man lives.
But a snowman doesn't. Only in frozen. I need to let it gooooooo that I can't pee on a snow man. Sorry!

Clownstripe:
Q:why do u play on avicus?
A:Because I'm not banned :)
Q:Do you like cats
A:I love cats!
Q:Do you have sawg O.o?
A:Yea I have budder sweeeg!

mooncat69:
Q:How heavy were you when you were just born?
A:Umm I dunno probaly around 100000000 kilos :)

JRLscrubezpz:
Q(s):Do u wub me?
ru a skid
ru a scrub
A(s):
Of course not! Ewww why am I your mother? I'm going to throw you in a ravine with Chuck Norris.
Iol nub
